publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-5347 Joe FitzPatrick: Student Funding—That the Parliament notes with caution the work of Universities UK and its report, Changing Landscapes: future scenarios for variable tuition fees, in particular its model that tuition fees in England should be increased further; notes that this has been met with concern by some student groups, and reiterates a commitment to free education in Scotland. Motions and amendments which have attracted additional support

S3M-5347 Joe FitzPatrick: Student Funding—That the Parliament notes with caution the work of Universities UK and its report, Changing Landscapes: future scenarios for variable tuition fees, in particular its model that tuition fees in England should be increased further; notes that this has been met with concern by some student groups, and reiterates a commitment to free education in Scotland.
S3M-5347 Student Funding (lodged on 3 December 2009) Michael Matheson*
S3M-5347 Student Funding (lodged on 3 December 2009) Robin Harper*, Bill Kidd*, Brian Adam*, Bob Doris*, Shirley-Anne Somerville*, Aileen Campbell*, Rob Gibson*
S3M-5347 Student Funding (lodged on 3 December 2009) Jamie Hepburn*, Stuart McMillan*, Gil Paterson*
S3M-5347 Student Funding (lodged on 3 December 2009) Sandra White*, Christina McKelvie*
